author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'BSE Notices'}
headline: PSL's board meeting held on August 09, 2018
description: We wish to inform you that a meeting of Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled to be held on Thursday, August 09, 2018 to consider, approve and take on record the Un-audited Financial Results of the Company for the quarter ended June 30, 2018.
articleBody: Pursuant to Regulation 29 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we wish to inform you that a meeting of Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled to be held on Thursday, the 9th day of August, 2018 to consider, approve and take on record the Un-audited Financial Results of the Company for the quarter ended June 30, 2018.  Further, as per Company's Code of Conduct for Prevention of Insider Trading framed in accordance with the SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations, 2015, the trading window shall remain closed for all Designated Employees of the Company from July 25, 2018 to August 11, 2018 (both days inclusive).   Kindly take this information on record and oblige.Source : BSE

author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'BSE Notices'}
headline: PSL : Outcome of board meeting
description: This is to inform you that the Board of Directors in its meeting held today i.e. May 24, 2018, has approved the Audited Financial Results for the Quarter and Financial Year ended on March 31, 2018.
articleBody: This is to inform you that the Board of Directors in its meeting held today i.e. May 24, 2018, has approved the Audited Financial Results for the Quarter and Financial Year ended on March 31, 2018 under regulation 33 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015. In the view of same, we are attaching herewith a summarized copy of Financial Results along with Audit Report issued by the Statutory Auditors of the Company. Kindly take the same on your records and oblige. Source : BSE

headline: PSL: Outcome of board meeting

articleBody: The Board of Directors in its meeting held today i.e. November 10, 2017 has approved and taken on record the un-audited financial results for the Quarter &amp; half year ended on September 30, 2017 under regulation 33 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015.Source : BSE

author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'BSE Notices'}
headline: PSL: Outcome of board meeting
description: This is to inform you that the Board of Directors in its meeting held today i.e. May 9, 2017.
articleBody: With reference to the captioned subject, this is to inform you that the Board of Directors in its meeting held today i.e. May 9, 2017, has approved the Audited Financial Results for the Quarter and Financial Year ended on March 31, 2017 under regulation 33 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015. In the view of same, we are enclosing herewith a summarized copy of Financial Results along with Audit Report issued by the Statutory Auditors of the Company.Source : BSE

headline: PSL's board meeting on February 09, 2017
description: PSL Ltd has informed BSE that a meeting of Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled to be held on February 09, 2017, inter alia, to consider, approve and take on record the un-audited financial results of the Company for the quarter ended on December 31, 2016.
articleBody: PSL Ltd has informed BSE that a meeting of Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled to be held on February 09, 2017, inter alia, to consider, approve and take on record the un-audited financial results of the Company for the quarter ended on December 31, 2016.Further, as per Company's Code of Conduct for Prevention of Insider Trading framed in accordance with the SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations, 2015, the trading window shall remain closed for all Designated Employees of the Company from February 01, 2017 to February 11, 2017 (both days inclusive) for the purpose of considering the un-audited financial results of the Company for the quarter ended on December 31, 2016.Source : BSE Read all announcements in PSL

author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'webtech_news18'}
headline: PSL: Outcome of board meeting
description: PSL Ltd has informed BSE that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on May 24, 2016, has approved the allotment of 25999232 equity shares to Seven (7) Promoter Group Entities and One (1) Lender of the Company.
articleBody: PSL Ltd has informed BSE that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on May 24, 2016, has approved the allotment of 25999232 equity shares to Seven (7) Promoter Group Entities and One (1) Lender of the Company pursuant to the terms and conditions prescribed for restructuring of Company's debt through CDR mechanism approved by the CDR Empowered Group on September 23, 2013.Source : BSE Read all announcements in PSL

author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'webtech_news18'}
headline: PSL: Updates on subsidiary company
description: The United States Bankruptcy court has passed an order for authorizing and approving the sale of substantially all of PSL North America LLC’s assets to Jindal Tubular USA LLC in accordance with the terms of the Asset Purchase Agreement, free and clear of all liens, claims, encumbrances and other interest.
articleBody: With reference to the earlier letter dated June 30, 2014 wherein the Company had informed that the Company's two subsidiaries namely PSL USA INC and PSL North America LLC have filed Chapter 11 proceeding before the bankruptcy Court of district of Delaware USA, in this regard, PSL Ltd has now informed BSE that The United States Bankruptcy court has now passed an order for:1. Authorizing and approving the sale of substantially all of PSL North America LLC’s assets to Jindal Tubular USA LLC in accordance with the terms of the Asset Purchase Agreement, free and clear of all liens, claims, encumbrances and other interest.2. Approving the assumption and assignment of contracts; and3. Approving entering into ancillary agreement and4. Granting related reliefThe sale of the aforesaid subsidiaries of PSL Limited through bankruptcy proceeding is now complete.Source : BSE Read all announcements in PSL

headline: PSL fixes book closure for AGM
description: PSL has informed that the Register of Members &amp; Share Transfer Books of the Company will remain closed from March 13, 2014 to March 19, 2014 (both days inclusive) for the purpose of Annual General Meeting (AGM) of the Company to be held on March 19, 2014.
articleBody: PSL Ltd has informed BSE that the Register of Members &amp; Share Transfer Books of the Company will remain closed from March 13, 2014 to March 19, 2014 (both days inclusive) for the purpose of Annual General Meeting (AGM) of the Company to be held on March 19, 2014.Source : BSE Read all announcements in PSL

headline: PSL standalone Dec '13 sales at Rs 77.74 crore
description: PSL has reported a standalone sales turnover of Rs 77.74 crore and a net loss of Rs 93.23 crore for the quarter ended Dec '13
articleBody: PSL has reported a standalone sales turnover of Rs 77.74 crore and a net loss of Rs 93.23 crore for the quarter ended Dec '13.For the quarter ended Dec 2012 the standalone sales turnover was Rs 491.92 crore and net loss was Rs 16.07 crore.PSL shares closed at 15.80 on February 17, 2014 (BSE) and has given -17.92% returns over the last 6 months and -62.38% over the last 12 months.PSLStandalone Quarterly Results-------- in Rs. author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'webtech_news18'}
headline: PSL: Board meeting on Oct 30, 2013
description: PSL board meeting be held on October 30, 2013, for seeking shareholders consent through Postal Ballot under Section 192A of the Companies Act, 1956 read with Companies (Passing of Resolution by Postal Ballot) Rules, 2011. confirms, approve and ratify and the proposal for restructuring of the Company's Debts by way of the special resolution.
articleBody: PSL Ltd has informed BSE that a meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company will be held on October 30, 2013, for seeking shareholders’ consent through Postal Ballot under Section 192A of the Companies Act, 1956 read with Companies (Passing of Resolution by Postal Ballot) Rules, 2011 on the following matters:1. confirms, approve and ratify and the proposal for restructuring of the Company’s Debts by way of the special resolution;2. Increase in Authorised Capital of the Company and effecting necessary amendments in the Memorandum &amp; Articles of Association of the Company; and3. Issuance of equity shares on preferential basis to “Promoters &amp; Promoters Group” and “Lenders” of the Company by way of special resolution under Section 81(1A) of the Companies Act, 1956.Source : BSE Read all announcements in PSL

author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'webtech_news18'}
headline: PSL: Updates on appointment of nominee director by ICICI Bank
description: PSL has informed that on August 19, 2013, Mr. Sandeep Sharma has been appointed as 'Nominee Director' by ICICI Bank from whom the Company has availed some financial assistance.
articleBody: PSL Ltd has informed BSE that on August 19, 2013, Mr. Sandeep Sharma has been appointed as 'Nominee Director' by ICICI Bank from whom the Company has availed some financial assistance. The said appointment has been made by ICICI in terms of the right available to them vide the special terms and conditions of the financial assistance which was availed by the Company earlier.Source : BSE Read all announcements in PSL

headline: PSL standalone Jun '13 sales at Rs 203.20 crore
description: PSL Limited has reported a standalone sales turnover of Rs 203.20 crore and a net loss of Rs 128.90 crore for the quarter ended Jun '13
articleBody: PSL Limited has reported a standalone sales turnover of Rs 203.20 crore and a net loss of Rs 128.90 crore for the quarter ended Jun '13.For the quarter ended Jun 2012 the standalone sales turnover was Rs 638.15 crore and net profit was Rs 14.81 crore.PSL shares closed at 21.80 on August 12, 2013 (NSE) and has given -50.34% returns over the last 6 months and -62.70% over the last 12 months.PSL LimitedStandalone Quarterly Results-------- in Rs. author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'webtech_news18'}
headline: PSL: Updates on extension of financial year
description: The Registrar of Companies, Goa has recently granted approval, allowing the extension of financial year 2012-13 by a period of six months so as to end on September 30, 2013. Accordingly the said financial year will now comprise of a period up to 18 months i.e. April 01, 2012 up to September 30, 2013.
articleBody: With reference to the earlier announcement about the Company’s decision subject to necessary approval from Registrar of Companies, for extension of financial year 2012-13 by a period of six months so as to end on September 30,2013, PSL Ltd has now informed BSE that the Registrar of Companies, Goa has recently granted his approval, allowing the extension of the aforesaid financial year 2012-13. Accordingly the said financial year will now comprise of a period up to 18 months i.e. April 01, 2012 up to September 30, 2013.Source : BSE Read all announcements in PSL
